subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Coco Crisp hit a tie-breaking double as Boston won a matchup of the American League East’s top two teams, defeating the visiting Tampa Bay Rays, 7-4, on Tuesday night.
snippet: Coco Crisp hit a tie-breaking double as Boston won a matchup of the American League East’s top two teams, defeating the visiting Tampa Bay Rays, 7-4, on Tuesday night.
